short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Read well-formatted YouTube transcripts on the site. Adds 'Read' button to the web version of YouTube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sometimes you want to read the contents of a YouTube video instead of watching it. The service yego.me helps with this. With this extension in one click you will open a transcript from the YouTube.

Install the extension and you will be able to read youtube instead of watch, save time, reduce dopamine overdose and increase your mental health.

Free of charge. Ads free. No sign-up required. Entire youtube.

This is single developer, spare time, non-funding or investments project. Please be patient on any imperfections. Write to me I'll try to fix or help.
